sentences.en: Can you afford to splash out a little? Is your budget unlimited?
sentences.cn: 你能稍微奢侈一点吗？你的预算是否有上限？

sentences.en: He can afford to sit out the property slump.
sentences.cn: 他的经济实力可以撑过这次房地产市场萧条期。

sentences.en: He could not afford luxury food on his pay.
sentences.cn: 靠自己的工资他买不起奢侈的食品。

sentences.en: How can she afford to eat out every night?
sentences.cn: 每天晚上下馆子她怎么能负担得起？

sentences.en: I couldn’t afford the rent on my own.
sentences.cn: 我单靠自己付不起房租。

sentences.en: I really can't afford to see this company go belly up.
sentences.cn: 我绝对不能眼睁睁地看着这家公司垮掉。

sentences.en: If I could afford it I'd have four television sets.
sentences.cn: 假如能买得起，我就会有4台电视机。

sentences.en: It would be nice to be able to afford to retire earlier.
sentences.cn: 无后顾之忧而能提早退休当是件幸事。

sentences.en: Many hospitals say they simply can't afford to computerize.
sentences.cn: 很多医院说他们根本没资金实现计算机化。

sentences.en: Only the extremely rich could afford to lunch at the Mirabelle.
sentences.cn: 只有非常有钱的人才能在米拉贝勒餐厅吃得起午餐。

sentences.en: People can't even afford to pony up for movie tickets.
sentences.cn: 人们甚至买不起电影票。

sentences.en: She could no longer afford to keep him at school.
sentences.cn: 她已无法再供他读书。

sentences.en: Someone with an income of $34,895 can afford this loan.
sentences.cn: 一个收入为34,895美元的人能负担得起这笔贷款。

sentences.en: Soon the villagers couldn't afford to buy food for themselves.
sentences.cn: 很快村民们就买不起口粮了。

sentences.en: The best housing they could afford was crowded and filthy.
sentences.cn: 他们能住得起的最好的住所也非常拥挤、肮脏不堪。

sentences.en: The new law will afford protection to employees.
sentences.cn: 新法律将为雇员提供保障。

sentences.en: The room affords a beautiful view over the city.
sentences.cn: 这房间可以俯瞰城市美景。

sentences.en: They could not afford to spoil those maps by careless colouring.
sentences.cn: 若是上色的时候不小心弄坏了那些地图，他们可承担不起。

sentences.en: They pay full rates. Mind you, they can afford it.
sentences.cn: 他们付全价，请注意，他们是付得起的。

sentences.en: We can’t afford to wait any longer or we’ll miss the plane.
sentences.cn: 我们再也不能等下去了，否则会赶不上飞机的。

sentences.en: We can’t afford to wait any longer or we’ll miss the plane. ＃
sentences.cn: 我们再也不能等下去了，否则会赶不上飞机的。

trans.tran_cn: 买得起，承受得住，提供，抽得出（时间）
trans.tran_en: to provide something or allow something to happen

trans.tran_cn: 负担得起， 买得起； 抽得出； 提供； 担负得起
trans.tran_en: to provide something or allow something to happen
